game.name: FocusScape: Lofi Productivity
game.shortDescription: FocusScape: Lofi Productivity is a minimalist productivity game where you manage tasks and daily objectives, focus with a built-in Pomodoro timer, customize ambient sounds and music, and earn levels to unlock regions of Midreach and uncover quiet journal entries along the way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: FocusScape: Lofi Productivity is a minimalist productivity game where you manage tasks and daily objectives, focus with a built-in Pomodoro timer, customize ambient sounds and music, and earn levels to unlock regions of Midreach and uncover quiet journal entries along the way.
